transcript:
you get a gut feeling about someone or
something make sure that you trust it
here's the reason why in our society
we're taught to follow our minds but our
minds were actually developed in the
womb after our heart was our heart our
gut feeling usually knows the path and
the Brain takes a whole lot of time to
catch up so if you get a gut feeling
about someone good or bad or that
something is right or that something is
wrong make sure that you trust it even
if it doesn't logically make sense to go
in a different direction if you follow
your gut feeling follow your heart it
always knows what is right first it just
usually takes a little bit of time for
the brain to catch up
